abstract: The Independent Community Bankers of America needs to explain why it opposes a limit on debit-card fees that would seem to benefit its members, an economist writes.
snippet: The Independent Community Bankers of America needs to explain why it opposes a limit on debit-card fees that would seem to benefit its members, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: 05/13/11 | Updated to take account of the association’s comment on its role in the debit card category.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
